content: lion brand pattern # 70200ad skill level easy level 2 vanna s choice® article #860 10 colors 22 balls total *mustard brick taupe rust olive pea green linen dusty rose purple silver blue* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm special stitches hdc3tog hdc5tog make 80 small squares in 14-row pattern using colors noted in the assembly diagram following assembly diagram sew 4 small squares together to make each large square sew large squares together to make afghan crochet edging to finish
